item.title: How I Restore Backups
item.description: My recent post about replacing my backup solution with BorgBackup ended with a bit of a cliffhanger… I still needed to try and restore some data from backup.

item.title: Git With 2FA on Linux
item.description: SSH keys have, for a long time, been the preferred method of authentication when using Git with remote repositories.
